text: Hello all. I've started looking into learning some CRM development with serverless functions and custom cards. Although the docs on getting started are nice, I feel a need for more advanced project examples to actually grasp how it all works. Are the such examples available somewhere? The ones at <https://github.com/HubSpot/ui-extensions-examples> are quite basic.
Can you give an example of a project you would like to see?
Thanks Johan, we are looking to find out more about what places developers are struggle to add these examples. Can you tell me what type of examples could help you most?
<@U03FJQPSC0Y> I literally just said the same thing....

Thank you both for your replies. It's difficult to be exact since I'm mostly wanting to explore the possibilities right now.
My questions are quite general, like "How do I conditionally render additional cards?" and "How do I pass data between my serverless functions?" If you want a scenario, one thing I was looking into was to add a card with some buttons for support staff, to perform routine tasks easily from one central plats on the ticket - such as closing ticket with default status, changing pipelines etc.
You can conditionally render cards by sending a different sendResponse, the sendResponse is triggered everytime the submit button (or whatever button triggers your function) is pressed
You can send data between functions using axios
so, setting up endpoints for my business logic and using them via axios?
Ok cool. I believe that gives me a way forward. Thanks for helping, appreciate it.
For sure, let me know if you run into any issues, I can hop on a call and walk you through the setup
For sure. It's getting late in the workday where I am though so I probably won't get to it until Monday.
